languages.text: "Он наг и беззащитен — как никогда прежде. Но пока его цвета не обернулись пеплом — есть шанс все исправить".

traits.locale_text: [draft] "Он наг и беззащитен — как никогда прежде. Но пока его душа дышит цветом, пока не обращена в пепел — еще не все потеряно".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "He is unarmoured and defenceless as never before. But, until his colours turn to ash, there is a chance yet to set things right."
languages.original_text: "Он наг и беззащитен — как никогда прежде. Но пока его цвета не обернулись пеплом — есть шанс все исправить".

traits.locale_text: "He is unarmoured and defenceless as never before. But until his colours turn to ash, there is a chance yet to set things right."
"He is unarmoured and defenceless as never before. But until his colours turn to ash, there is a chance yet to set things right."
"He is unarmoured and defenceless as never before. But, until his colours turn to ash, there is a chance yet to set things right."
"He is unarmoured and defenceless as never before. But, until his colours turn to ash, there is a chance yet to set things right."
"He is unarmoured and defenceless as never before. But, until his colours turn to ash, there is a chance yet to set things right."
"He is unarmoured and defenceless as never before. But, until his colours turn to ash, there is a chance yet to set things right."

languages.text: "Er ist ungeschützt und wehrlos wie nie zuvor. Aber bis seine Farben zu Asche werden, gibt es eine Chance, alles wieder in Ordnung zu bringen."
languages.original_text: "He is unarmoured and defenceless as never before. But, until his colours turn to ash, there is a chance yet to set things right."

traits.locale_text: "Er ist ungeschützt und wehrlos wie nie zuvor. Aber bis seine Farben zu Asche werden, gibt es eine Chance, alles wieder in Ordnung zu bringen."

languages.text: « Il est plus vulnérable que jamais. Mais tant que ses couleurs ne deviennent pas gris cendre, il y a encore un espoir de corriger le tir. »
languages.original_text: "He is unarmoured and defenceless as never before. But, until his colours turn to ash, there is a chance yet to set things right."

traits.locale_text: « Il est plus vulnérable que jamais. Mais tant que ses couleurs ne deviennent pas gris cendre, il y a encore un espoir de corriger le tir. »

languages.text: “他此刻手无寸铁，毫无防备，这样的情况以前从没发生过。不过，他的色彩还没有彻底变成死灰色，还有挽回的机会。”
languages.original_text: "He is unarmoured and defenceless as never before. But, until his colours turn to ash, there is a chance yet to set things right."

traits.locale_text: “他此刻手无寸铁，毫无防备，这样的情况以前从没发生过。不过，他的色彩还没有彻底变成死灰色，还有挽回的机会。”

languages.text: «Está más desnudo e indefenso que nunca, pero, hasta que sus colores se vuelvan ceniza, la recuperación es posible».
languages.original_text: "He is unarmoured and defenceless as never before. But, until his colours turn to ash, there is a chance yet to set things right."

traits.locale_text: «Está más desnudo e indefenso que nunca, pero, hasta que sus colores se vuelvan ceniza, la recuperación es posible».

languages.text: 「彼はこれまでになく、無防備で丸腰です。ですが、彼の色が灰色に変わるその時までは、物事を正す望みはまだ残っています」
languages.original_text: "He is unarmoured and defenceless as never before. But, until his colours turn to ash, there is a chance yet to set things right."

traits.locale_text: 「彼はこれまでになく、無防備で丸腰です。ですが、彼の色が灰色に変わるその時までは、物事を正す望みはまだ残っています」

languages.text: "Zırhsız ve hiç olmadığı kadar savunmasız. Ancak renkleri küle dönene kadar her şeyi yoluna koymak için şans var."
languages.original_text: "He is unarmoured and defenceless as never before. But, until his colours turn to ash, there is a chance yet to set things right."

traits.locale_text: "Zırhsız ve hiç olmadığı kadar savunmasız. Ama renkleri küle dönene kadar her şeyi yoluna koymak için şans var."
